body_html:
I don't know for sure whether there's something extra you need here. It sure does sound like this would be the right thing to do from the Bazel args.

@damienmg for more Bazel expertise.

I do believe this is not specific to anything TemsorFlow is doing in particular, so could you file an issue over for Bazel, and reference this one? I will close this, if it turns out we can fix this on the TensorFlow side, we can reopen.
